## ============================================== ## If view=index then displays the index of pages ## ============================================== #if ($view == "index") #includeTopic("XWiki.Tableview") #elseif ($view == "tree") ## ============================================== ## If view=tree then displays the treeview ## ============================================== #includeTopic("XWiki.Treeview") #elseif ($view == "attachments") ## ============================================== ## If view=attachments then display attachments ## ============================================== #includeTopic("XWiki.AllAttachments") #else ## ============================================== ## If view=orphans then display orphans ## ============================================== #includeTopic("XWiki.OrphanedPages") #end
